entries.meaning: An unlicensed drinking establishment, especially in Ireland, Scotland, and South Africa.
examples: ‘Well, let's line,’ he said to Ben. ‘We can fill up at a shebeen.’

verbs.description: shebeen (third-person singular simple present shebeens, present participle shebeening, simple past and past participle shebeened)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To operate an unlicensed drinking establishment.
